title: fix: resolve recurring TinyBird query timeouts on KPI dashboard
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Taming the TinyBird
gist.blurb: Our internal KPI dashboard was getting a bit too enthusiastic with its queries. We taught it some patience and gave it a cache.
gist.summary: Implemented request batching and Cloudflare caching for TinyBird queries to resolve timeouts on the KPI dashboard.
gist.impact: Ensures reliable loading of internal metrics without hitting API concurrency limits.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot organizing a chaotic flock of small pixel birds (representing data queries) into an orderly queue. A 'CACHE' birdhouse sits nearby.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot organizing a queue of small pixel birds entering a birdhouse labeled 'CACHE'. A robot with a monitor head checks a stopwatch nearby. Lime green (#ecf874) and pastel blue background. Warm lighting, organized vibes. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, chunky sprites.
